description:
Gore Magala makes a triumphant and terrifying return in Monster Hunter Wilds. First introduced in Monster Hunter 4, the flagship monster is as deadly as ever, making use of its aggressive nature to inflict the challenging Frenzy state.

description:
Jin Dahaad is one of the biggest creatures in Monster Hunter Wilds, and possibly the most complicated fight of them all. The monster covers its body in ridges, which need to be broken before you can start dealing serious damage. This is, as expected, easier said than done.

If you’re scratching your head over this tricky fight, don’t fret, as there are a few things to keep in mind that will alleviate your frustration. This guide covers the Jin Dahaad weaknesses and resistances so you can prepare accordingly,
title: Jin Dahaad weakness, location, and strategy in Monster Hunter Wilds

description:
Monster Hunter Wilds wouldn’t be complete without a flagship monster. Guardian Arkveld is a central piece in the main story, and a recurring face to smack that presents a challenge each time.

description:
The culmination of Monster Hunter Wilds is at the hands of Zoh Shia. This monster is the definition of a final boss, and a fitting end to the Low Rank section of Capcom’s latest entry in the hunting series. It’s a spectacle that towers over the likes of Jin Dahaad in scale, and one you should prepare yourself for accordingly.

If you’re stuck at the very end of the first half of the campaign, don’t fret. This guide covers the Zoh Shia weaknesses and resistances so you can prepare accordingly, where to find it,
title: Zoh Shia weakness, location, and strategy in Monster Hunter Wilds

description:

The weekly reset time in Destiny 2 is a little odd compared to some other live service games. Instead of having a consistent reset time, Destiny 2’s reset shifts with the yearly daylight savings changes. That means the answer to “what time is the reset this week” actually changes twice a year.
